entry.title: How to Create Dynamic API Routes in Next.js
entry.summary: Next.js is a React-based framework that enables developers to create full-stack web applications by extending the latest React features. Next helps you add additional features and optimizations to your React apps like static site generation (SSG), server-side rendering (SSR), automatic code splitting and bundling, and dynamic API routes.
